version_description:
-Added more than 20 new languages
-Added ability to change your default search engine
-Added a new button to easily share a webpage or open the existing webpage in Firefox or Safari

-Added more than 20 new languages
-Added ability to change your default search engine
-Added a new button to easily share a webpage or open the existing webpage in Firefox or Safari

This update adds support for the following new localizations: Albanian, Basque, Bengali, Breton, Burmese, Catalan, Hebrew, Icelandic, Irish, Kazakh, Korean, Lao, Lower Sorbian, Norwegian Bokmål, Norwegian Nynorsk, Persian, Portuguese (Portugal), Scottish Gaelic, Thai, Upper Sorbian.
This update contains stability improvements and bug fixes.
This update contains stability improvements and bug fixes.
This update contains stability improvements and bug fixes.
This update contains stability improvements and bug fixes.
This update contains stability improvements and bug fixes.
In response to user feedback, we have disabled Focus reading the user's clipboard.
Firefox Focus 3.6 is easier than ever to use - open the App and you can search right away. You can also now save images to your camera roll from Firefox Focus.
Bug fixes
We've disabled the Share / Save / Copy Pop Up until we fix it up. Apologies to our devoted users!
Support for iOS11 and a fix for the Save / Copy Image Sheet.
Support for iPhone X!
Focus now indicates how many and what type of ad trackers have been blocked for each website you visit.
Add sites to an autocomplete list to quickly access them with less typing; this data is never collected or shared. Add custom search engines and set them as your default in Focus.
Add sites to an autocomplete list to quickly access them with less typing; this data is never collected or shared. Add custom search engines and set them as your default in Focus.
Bug fixes and stability improvements
Bug fixes and stability improvements
Bug fixes and stability improvements

We’ve listened to your feedback and added:
* “Find in Page”, to help you find specific words and phrases.
* “Request Desktop Page”, to give you the ability to switch between mobile and desktop versions of pages where available.
* "Face/Touch ID Security", to let you secure Focus with Face or Touch ID when you leave to do other things, providing even more browsing privacy.
Bug fixes and localization improvements.
Bug fixes

Thank you for updating to a new version of Firefox Focus. This version includes the following new features.

- Support for iOS 12 and Siri shortcuts: Ask Siri to set and open a favorite website, erase and open Firefox Focus, and erase in the background.

- Brand new design with easier navigation.

- Homescreen tips: The Firefox Focus homescreen displays tips about features you may find useful.
Crash fixes.
Fixed a few bugs to make Focus even better
Crash fixes.
Fixes to re-enable Print and Saving to PDF.

* Fixes issues with navigation on Google AMP sites
* Fixes issues opening certain links from Safari
* Fixes an issue causing Google reCAPTCHA to fail
* Fixes an issue with drag and drop while on YouTube
* Fixes an issue with sharing a site to email

Thanks for using Firefox Focus! This release includes two new features as well as minor bug fixes:

* Search suggestions are now available, but off by default
* A button has been added to quickly include websites in the autocomplete list
Crash fixes.
Crash fixes.
This update includes stability improvements and security bug fixes.
Fixed a few bugs to make Focus even better

Thanks for updating to the latest version of Firefox Focus. This version includes:
* An update to the list of trackers blocked by the Focus app
Bug fixes and technical improvements.
Focus fans rejoice! With the release of iOS 14 and the latest version of Focus app, you can now set Focus as your default mobile browser.
Bug fixes and technical improvements.
Bug fixes and technical improvements.
Bug fixes and technical improvements.
Bug fixes and technical improvements.
